text: 8.17: FG 26.18; Ga 4.5-7; Fi 1.29; 2 T 2.11-12; VB 21.7Nza Fhe Bakɨmen tari ki. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nza zumgum Fhe Bakɨme nzan nɨɨn za suaŋgi bigir vhuuiŋ, nza Krais phorgɨp nta ndirga. Nza ntigem maaŋ muuŋgip ana ndigi zaagi, nza nta ndirga, nza zumgum zɨ bakɨme ndiv, ana phorgɨp mpirmpirɨga vhuun muuŋgirga.
